transcript:
then current, to the effect that the Due d'Enghien had gone secretly to Paris to visit Mademoiselle George; thatat her house he came upon Bonaparte, who also enjoyed the famous actress' favors, and that in his pres- ence Napoleon happened to fall into one of the fainting fits to which he was subject, and was thus at the due's mercy. The latter spared him, and this magnanimity Bonaparte subse- quently repaid by death.
